entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
